intro.p: Converts the elements in one of the input table's columns into an internal format (IndigoCell), which can then be rendered as molecule or used for further computations. The target column must contain string representations of molecules (SDF, Smiles, CML).
This node uses Indigo classes to parse and display structures.

fullDescription.option: The column that contains the molecules.
Appends a new molecule column (with the name as specified in the text field) if checked, replaces the original column otherwise.

ports.outPort: Table with the successfully parsed molecules
Table with the molecules that parsed with errors
